name: Seraphic Jam
description:
Slay the Demons of Jam and use their delicious blood as the filling in a grand cosmic sandwich in this Game Boy classic / lost work of scripture.

(The web version may not work properly in Chrome and related browsers; try Firefox or one of the downloadable versions)

Made in 72 hours for the Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2018.

Themes: Void Sandwich, Sticky Justice

Achievements: Gameboy, Maverick
